title: Frage betreffend Passwortlänge
author: snowbelix
body_snippet:
gibt es in der Version 1.77.1.xxx Einschränkungen in der länge der PW?!
Falls ja wie kann ich das lösen?

Besten Dank für ein kurzes Feedback.

Gruess Dani

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
The question is, if there is a password length limitation in mRemoteNG, though I'm missing the context. 

Do you know if the stored password has a character limit or not? I assume there is none, the target systems should be the limiting factor

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: As far as I aware we don't limit password length or characters type in it
